data.title: Travel to and from Central London
data.meta_description: Find out more about travelling between London Stansted Airport and Central London by train, coach, car and taxi.
data.text:
Travelling to and from London

There are a number of convenient transport links, with options to suit all budgets, timetables and destinations. Travellers can get to and from London by coach, bus, train or car. Whichever way you choose, by pre-booking your travel arrangements in advance, youâll save money on your journey.

Stansted to London: By bus and coach

National Express coaches to London Stansted Airport run 24-hours a day and stop at 38 pick-up points, including 15 in central London. Prices start from Â£5 one-way when booked in advance, so make sure you book your ticket today.

Find out more

Stansted to London: By train

Stansted Express trains are the quickest and most direct way to travel between London Stansted Airport and the capital. Services run every 15 minutes and tickets can be booked for as little as Â£9.45 one-way when bought in advance.

Find out more

Stansted to London: By car

London Stansted is conveniently situated just off the M11 motorway and is about 40 miles outside central London. If youâre considering renting a car, you can get one right at the airport at the car rental village. From small cars if youâre on a budget, to family cars and executive cars; thereâs something to suit everyone.

Find out more

Stansted to London: By taxi

Our recommended provider 24x7 Taxis has a reservation desk located in the international arrival concourse. There is also a courtesy telephone located in the domestic baggage reclaim area which connects you to the reservation desk.

To book a taxi in advance call 01279 661111.
